#summary Source Desktop description

= Introduction =

The Video Source Desktop is used to capture images from your current desktop


= Details =

To capture images from the desktop, WS4GL is relying on the feature of Java 6 thru the Robot class.  This class is mainly used for automated testing, but can capture at the specific location the content of the desktop and provided a buffered image as an output.

The mouse cursor is monitor when this source is activated to the capture area can follow the mouse cursor if needed.
